Hola a todos/as,
                          res reenviamos información acerca del seminario GeNoCAS que tendrá lugar mañana a las 10:00hs.

Saludos

---------- Forwarded message ---------
De: Gisela Tartaglia <gtartaglia@mate.unlp.edu.ar>
Date: lun, 30 ago 2021 a las 8:49
Subject: Seminario Geometría Noconmutativa : Martes 31/08 10hs
To: 


Hola, este martes a las 10:00hs tendremos el seminario virtual de Geometría Noconmutativa del Atlántico Sur (GeNoCAS).

En esta oportunidad va  a hablar Devarshi Mukherjee (Göttingen)

Title: Analytic Hochschild-Kostant-Rosenberg Theorem

Let R be a Banach ring. We prove that the category of chain complexes of complete bornological R-modules (and several related categories) are homotopy and derived algebraic contexts in the sense of Toen-Vezzosi and Raksit. We then use the framework of derived algebra to prove a general version of the HKR Theorem, which in particular relates the circle action on the Hochschild algebra to the de Rham-differential- enriched-de Rham algebra of a simplicial, commutative, complete bornological algebra. This has a geometric interpretation in the language of derived analytic geometry, namely, the derived loop stack of a derived analytic stack is equivalent to the shifted tangent stack. These observations are part of joint work-in-progress with Jack Kelly and Kobi Kremnizer.

Join Zoom Meeting
https://exactas-uba.zoom.us/j/83915550825

Meeting ID: 839 1555 0825
Passcode: 550348




Saludos,
Guillermo Cortiñas y Gisela Tartaglia
